Contemporary & Top 40 The 90s The 80s The 70s The 50s & 60s Info About The Band Client & Audience Reviews Frequently Asked Questions Our Song List Photos of Performances Videos of Performances Free Quote About The Grooves Cover Band How We Make Every Event the Event of the Year Whether you want a rockin‚Äô dance party or an electrifying live show, one thing‚Äôs for sure. You want everyone to have a great time at your event! We live to make that happen for you. In fact, our mission is to knock it out of the park and make every event we play a smashing success. We thrive off of seeing people have a wonderful time, which plays into our larger vision as a band. Ultimately, we want to bring together friends, families, coworkers, and other partygoers to create fun-filled experiences that everyone can look back on with fondness long after the party‚Äôs over. We‚Äôve been working toward that vision now for more than 27 years. Curious to know how it all started? The Start and Evolution of The Grooves I‚Äôm Ron‚Äîbandleader of The Grooves‚Äîand I started out in an original band. I loved playing original music but it was tough to stay booked and busy. So I took a cue from the many booking agents who kept telling me that there were gigs to be booked and money to be made in playing covers. The band decided to give it a try and, once we did, we all agreed that we‚Äôd never had so much fun playing music. It was so rewarding to see guests having an absolute blast, dancing and singing along to their favorite songs. We were hooked! And we still are all these years later even though there have been some challenges along the way. Learning How to Fuel a Party One challenge we faced early on was figuring out which songs would hit the spot. We knew we couldn‚Äôt just play the songs we liked; we had to choose songs that would be entertaining for folks of all ages and get them on the dance floor when the occasion called for it. Whew‚Ä¶ tricky! In addition to listening to people‚Äôs requests, we‚Äôve tried hundreds of songs over the years to figure out which ones get the party started and keep it alive. Today we have 170+ of the most loved songs of all time songs in our repertoire to entertain and impress your guests. Working Hard For Clients Like You Additionally, we had a bit of a learning curve when it came to figuring out what people needed in terms of information, event planning help, and reassurance so that they could feel confident in booking The Grooves. We did (and still do) a lot of listening to clients to figure those things out. Has it paid off? You bet! Our clients will tell you that they love our friendly and responsive communication style. Not to mention our thorough process to make sure that you have all the info you need from us and we have all the equipment and info we need to contribute to a spectacular event that goes off without a hitch. The Grooves Today Today, we are one of the most flexible bands in Texas. We can provide anywhere from a 3-piece to 10-piece band to accommodate your budget and any space restrictions, as well as to create the perfect vibe for your party. Not to mention that, over the years, we‚Äôve created a huge collection of costumes and equipment that allows us to provide the best experience for any event. And, outside of our amazing band, we also work with some of the best talent in Austin. For example, we can call in dancers to give your event an extra wow factor or a DJ to keep people dancing in between our sets. We‚Äôre a true one-stop-shop. When you book us, you won‚Äôt have to worry at all about entertainment. As long as you let us know what you need, you can trust that we‚Äôve got all the bases covered! Starting to Notice a Theme? With The Grooves, it all comes back around to you and your guests. If you ask us, getting a great result for you and creating amazing, memorable experiences for your guests is what it‚Äôs all about! We can‚Äôt wait to start your party! Sincerely, Ron and The Grooves Keeping Texas Entertained The Grooves band travels throughout Texas to provide high-end entertainment for weddings, corporate events, fundraisers, and private parties. We‚Äôre one of the top Texas bands for hire in Austin, Dallas, Houston, and San Antonio. We also play in Abilene, Midland, Fort Worth, Tyler, Bryan and College Station, New Braunfels, and all other towns in the great state of Texas. ‚úÆ Excellent The Grooves Dance Band 4.9 Nicole Sword The Grooves Dance Band performed at my in laws 50th wedding anniversary in Tyler, Texas. The Grooves sounded awesome and really played into the crowd and kept people up and dancing. Everyone had the best time and I would highly recommend them for your event! Tons of fun and played a variety of songs L. W. Hands down best band! Super easy to correspond with and timely responses! Great attitudes/entertainment for our charity benefit! So many compliments and can‚Äôt wait to hire again! Thanks for coming to the Hangar Hotel in Fredericksburg! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for having us! You folks were so much fun and really gave us the rockstar treatment! Can‚Äôt wait until the next one! Kristen Shouldice The Grooves team were a pleasure to work with. From initial contact through to performance - the team were great! Our attendees loved the music and ambiance set at our event. Would definitely recommend them for similar events. Dana DuPlantis The Grooves just played for our annual Maritime Gala with a Boots and Bling theme and they were amazing!! They were very easy to work with and had the crowd dancing and singing all night! We will be booking them again for future events as they can play such a great variety of music!! We‚Äôd give more stars if possible. Response from the owner: Thanks so much! It was so much fun being your chosen band for you folks at your party! Can‚Äôt wait until the next fundraiser gala! Erika Benjamin Ron and the Grooves played at our wedding last month and they were just amazing! From the first email to the day itself, Ron was always on hand to help us get everything organised. The band were the absolute highlight of the wedding reception and kept the dance floor packed with their fun and polished performances. They were so accommodating, helping us to bring together music from our two cultures and to create a wedding reception that truly represented us and brought together all of our friends and family to celebrate with us. Thank you so much again guys!! Response from the owner: Thank you so much Erika! You and Adam were amazing to perform for, and we really felt like a part of the family with you folks, you are all so genuine, so much fun and such amazing folks! We had a blast dancing with Erwin and everyone to all the Armenian dances as well! So much fun! We wish you all the best! Samantha Sloan Amazing group! Ron was very communicative and flexible. Great vocalists, song choices were perfect for my event. I plan on using this group again for future events!! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for choosing our our Austin party band for your corporate event! It was a fun crowd and a blast being on Lake Austin with you! Evelyn Ellis We had The Grooves for our recent Symphony gala and they were very professional and easy to work with. Everyone loved the music and had a great time dancing!! Response from the owner: Thanks so much for your review of our Austin party band! it was a blast performing for such fun folks at your debutante ball! Jessica Pina The Grooves were by far one of the most professional, friendly, and easy to work with bands!.From the beginning when I sent my inquiry I knew they would be a group that I would enjoy working with. All communication was timely and friendly. It was clear and all my questions were answered promptly. The prep work was made simple and requests were handled with grace..On the day of the event, the ensemble showed up as expected, set up in a neat and orderly fashion, and engaged in conversation with other folks that were there and setting up as well. When it was time to perform, ALL expectations were met! The music was the right volume, the songs were fun and festive, they honored the requests I made in song choices prior to the event, and they engaged our audience. There was not a single complaint from any guest and in fact, we had the most compliments we've had about a group since beginning our fundraising event over 10 years ago. A few folks even asked me for their contact information at the event..We are thankful for their time, their expertise, and the enthusiasm for what they do. We have already asked them to be part of next year's fundraiser! The Grooves is a band that we hope to be in relationship with for years to come. Response from the owner: Thank you so much for the kind words! It was our pleasure to be your Austin party band for this year and for next year as well! Amanda Hardy The Groves were Amazing! Ron and his team were so talented and professional. They helped make the couples wedding night a fabulous celebration! Would highly recommend this band for any event! Response from the owner: Thanks for the kind words about our Austin wedding band! You were the dream wedding coordinator to work with! Hope to work with you at another wedding reception soon! Barbara Files The Grooves performed for our group of 160 at a country club venue and everyone had a wonderful time. Their energy, talent and singing voices made it difficult to NOT dance and the dance floor remained full to the very end, but even those who did not dance, were treated to some great entertainment for all ages! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for having us at your dance party! It's always a pleasure performing for you all! It makes our night to see the dance floor packed! Everyone in our cover band wishes you all the best and hope to see you next time! Carrie Mackey The Grooves are a great variety band! Great music talent, wonderful voices, very entertaining and easy to work with. We have had them several times and plan to schedule them again! Sun City, Georgetown, Zoomers Response from the owner: Always a pleasure performing for you all! Thank you so much for having us at your dance party! Have a merry Christmas and a happy new year! Loren Dickson The Grooves are awesome! Everyone at our daughter's wedding reception commented on how great the band was - the dance floor was always crowded! Even one of our guests who is musician himself (playing at weddings) thought they were fantastic. They accommodated all special requests and could not have been nicer folks to deal with. Highly, highly recommend! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for the kind words! It was such a blast performing for the wedding and you folks were so much fun! Thanks so much for choosing us to be your wedding band! NECA PDJ Ron and the Grooves were excellent in all respects. They are a great cover band, terrific to work with and true professionals. They were perfect for our corporate dinner event. Highly recommend!!!!! Response from the owner: thank you so much for having us perform for your party! You all were such a fun audience! Please Call us for the next one! Emily Weichel We had the Grooves at our wedding reception and absolutely loved them! They kept the dance floor going for the entire time, catered to our crowd, and played the perfect variety of music! They listened to any special requests we made and incorporated them into the night! Ron would reply to emails super quickly and cordially. Loved working with them! We were beyond pleased and would recommend them to anyone!! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for the kind words! Your crowd was an absolute pleasure to perform for! One of the rockingest wedding receptions we have played in a long time! Total blast! Rita Ritenour A big thank you to The Groves Band for a fantastic evening of entertainment at our Boot Scootin' Ball at Gaylord Texas Resort. The crowd loved you - dance floor was full - they were talking about the party the next day and how WONDERFUL the band was. THANK YOU!!! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for having us at your gala and thanks again for the rockstar treatment! Micah Wiener The Grooves are the best! They played our wedding and people are still talking about the band months later.Ron and his team were understanding with our postponement. I can not recommend them highly enough! Response from the owner: Thanks Micah! for the kind words! your wedding was so much fun and your crazy crew was a total blast to perform for! Thanks so much for the rock star treatment at your wedding reception! Sandra Sidi We had a magical, rocking wedding thanks to Ron and the Grooves. They were incredible! My uncle is a music producer in LA, so we knew we had to have a great band. The Grooves didn't disappoint! They were excellent in taking in our music preferences ahead of time, professional and so well-equipped. We wanted a lot of country songs, but also Frank Sinatra and classics as well as modern dance favorite. The Grooves are so versatile, they performed them all with ease. It was very special to get to hear all our favorites. Even my uncle (who co-hosts the Grammy's) was impressed! Response from the owner: Thanks so much for the kind words! It was an honor to be your wedding band and such a blast playing for such fun folks at your wedding reception! We wish you and your new husband all the best! Ronnie Boegler These guys are first class! If you want the best, you found them. High energy and great people to work with. They definitely get the party started! Thanks for everything. Response from the owner: Thanks so much for having us at the wedding reception! The party was a total blast! Helen Young The Grooves Dance Band MADE our daughter and son-in=law‚Äôs wedding reception! The couple did their first dance right after they entered the reception, and The Grooves was so engaging that people started dancing even before dinner was served - including the parents of the bride! They kept it going full charge all night, which made for an amazingly great, fun-filled, unforgettable evening of celebration for the happy couple! Their light show added a lot to the ambiance, too. I can‚Äôt recommend The Grooves highly enough! Response from the owner: Thanks so much for having us at the wedding reception! You folks were such a blast to perform for! Best party ever! Michael Kerr My goodness what a great time. The band was friendly, talented and on point two words : Book This Band. Response from the owner: Thanks for choosing us to be your cover band for your party! It was a blast! Had lots of fun playing all the Motown hits! Rene Buckley We hired The Grooves for my husband‚Äôs retirement party. They were soooo good! Fun music,got people on the floor.. hiring them was an easy process. We were informed all5h3 way. They catered to our music likes and are very talented musicians! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for the kind words! it was such a fun party and an honor to be your party band! Marty Marty Jr Not sure how it could have been any better. Ron and the Grooves Dance Band were excellent, everyone had a fun and great time. The band adjusted to our schedule and we will definitely use "Ron and the Grooves Dance Band" for our next event!! Response from the owner: Thanks so much for having us! you had such a fun, rocking crew at the wedding reception! It was a blast! Gabby Anglin The Groves put on an AWESOME show! Ron was very easy to work with and quick to respond to emails and phone calls. They sounded amazing the entire night for our huge Summer Party on Main event! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for having us! It was a total blast and can‚Äôt wait to do it again! SCOTT LANE The Grooves played at our son's wedding last weekend and did a great job. Their setlist was full of audience participation songs and the dance floor was full with couples, families and singles. They definitely play to the crowd and know how to keep the dance floor packed. A great evening and a great choice. Response from the owner: Thanks so much for honoring us to be your wedding band! It was such a fun night and fun crowd! Jodie Hamilton Ron was great! Very communication, and details of everything I wanted from the band!! Worth every penny! They made the party, everyone asked how I found them!! Thanks for making Keith‚Äôs 50th more memorable! ‚ù§Ô∏è Response from the owner: Thanks so much for the kind words on our cover band! We had a total blast performing for your reception. All your guests at the party were so much fun! All the best to you and your crew and hope to perform for you again in the future! Shelby Riley Ron blew me away with his customer service at the beginning of planning my wedding, throughout as he responds very quickly to each and every email, and then sealed the deal the entire wedding day! Our guests loved the band, as they played all the right songs to keep the dance floor PACKED all night long! Being a bride, you love to have a vendor that shows up and shows out and Ron and The Grooves did just that. They were a huge hit, and my husband and I told them at the end of the night that we wish we could have a wedding more than once solely for them to play! We cannot say enough positive things about these guys! Ron MC'ed for us as well, and just knew how the night should flow. He and the band were perfect! You will not be disappointed if you book them. Response from the owner: Thank you so much for having us! it was an honor and a blast being a part of your wedding reception! You folks were so much fun! Thanks for treating us like rock stars with the awesome food and all! Lisa Coffman Great party band!!! Professional and on time. Response from the owner: Thanks for the kind words! Please call again for future parties, you folks were a blast! Tim Sparks Man !!! What a band..... Their music is on target, their energy is over the top and they had the crowd on its feet dancing all night !! We will be booking them again and for many events to come. Very awesome !! Thanks for the great show !! Response from the owner: You rock Tim! Love to see the dance floor packed with such a fun crowd! Anthony Medrano We had The Grooves perform at our wedding this past weekend. They performed outstandingly. Numerous people that attended loved every moment of every song. ‚ÄúAt Last‚Äù was the first song sang, and guests thought it was a recording. One guest did inform me that she had chills from the vocalist. The same goes for a bunch of songs. I highly recommend The Grooves to perform at any event you want to party. Response from the owner: Thank you so much Anthony! it was an honor to perform for such an amazing wedding reception with such fun folks! Betsy Blount We hired The Grooves band for our wedding and it was one of the best decisions we made! Everyone kept telling us how awesome the band was. They truly play to the crowd to try to keep the party going. They have a fairly large song selection too. Our friends and family had the time of their lives. My husband woke up the next morning and told me I had thrown him the best party of his life lol! Ron was so great to work with, very responsive! I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this band. The only bad thing of the night was that it ended too soon. We wanted to stay longer! I would hire them 10x over again. If you‚Äôre thinking about it, do it. It‚Äôs a game changer for any event, especially a wedding! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for the amazingly kind words! It was an honor performing for your special day and a total blast rocking out for such a fun crowd! I wish you both all the best! Paula Williams These guys ROCKED the house at Redberry Estate over the weekend with some great classic and modern music. Very classy, high energy, and funkadelic! Response from the owner: Hi Paula! Thanks for the kind words! We had so much fun performing for you all! What a fun wedding reception!! You all rocking it on the dance floor made our night!! Amy Crowson These guys are amazing to work with! As a Wedding Coordinator, I was so appreciative of the time Ron takes to work through all of the details for each couple. They also know how to bring the party and play off the crowd. Thanks, y'all! Response from the owner: Thank you so much! It was awesome to work with you too! Can‚Äôt recommend Amy and Avenue Q events enough! Amazing wedding planner and always spot on at the events! Lee S. Bortner The Grooves are awesome! They played our wedding over 10 years ago and were amazing then, and just great when we saw them at another wedding a few weeks ago. Plus Ron at The Grooves is very cool and super professional - if you‚Äôre looking for a band to play your wedding or special event, look no further! Response from the owner: Thanks so much! It was so great seeing you two and working with you at the wedding reception! Your wedding photos are amazing! Amanda Worrell The Grooves are by far the best dance band around. They have played at 2 of our kid‚Äôs weddings, and everyone loves them. Ron is very attentive to the requests of his clients, and the energy of the band carries over to the crowd! You won‚Äôt be disappointed if you choose The Grooves!! Response from the owner: Thanks for the vote as the best Austin wedding band! We had a blast at the reception and loved watching you folks cut a rug on the dance floor! Staci Roberts We had a 50th Anniversary party scheduled in March for my parents and when Covid hit and everything closed down Ron made sure we did not worry that they would work with us on rescheduling. We finally rescheduled for July and we had such a great time. The band checked with us ahead of time for all the plans, they showed up on time and ready to perform, they were so kind and made sure we had a great time. The music was fun and kept the dance floor full. All of our guest loved the band and made sure to comment on them. We would highly recommend The Grooves and would use them again for any event they are fun, full of energy, and sound amazing.. Response from the owner: Thank you so much for the review Staci! The party was so much fun and you all were such fun folks to rock out with! Let's do it again in 50 years for the next 50th anniversary party! Zach Ronhaar Awesome wedding band! The Grooves really rocked the dance floor at my cousins wedding in Houston at the Houstonian. Love the vocalists. They sounded just like the original artists and the band played all the classic wedding favorites and a good variety of new hits and a few country songs too. Highly recommend! Response from the owner: Thanks for having us, we had a blast at the wedding as well! Kelly L. The Grooves made my 40th birthday party such a blast! They are so talented and played great music that everyone danced the night away to. I highly recommend them as they will help take your party or event to the next level! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for having us be a party of your birthday party! You all were such a rocking crowd and so much fun! The venue was really cool too, nice choice! Please give us a shout for your next party, it was a blast! All the best! Claire Fallin The Grooves Dance Band was AMAZING! They played perfectly to our wedding guests and made our reception a blast! They provided a wide variety of song styles and were able to play everything from vintage jazz to modern pop songs. The band leader was very easy to get in touch with and communicated clearly and professionally. We would highly recommend hiring them for any event you're looking to make fun and enjoyable for your guests! Response from the owner: Thanks so much for having us for your special day! So glad you had as much fun as we did, and thanks again for treating us like rock stars with the killer food and all! It was our pleasure performing for you and so happy to be a party of your reception! Laine Gandy We worked with the Grooves for a corporate event and all I can say is WOW! Beyond talented, they were incredibly professional, and extremely accommodating for our group. They took our event to the next level - thank you! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for having us! You folks were such a pleasure to work with and made the job a blast! Call us next time we‚Äôd love to do it again! Lauren Webster Great band with fantastic energy and everyone at the party really enjoyed them. Ron, the manager, is very responsive and helpful and the band does a wonderful job curating their playlist to fit your event. You can't go wrong hiring this band! Highly recommend. Response from the owner: Thanks again for having us! Such a fun crowd and the party was a blast! jamie phillips The Grooves were awesome! We had them play our company Christmas Party. They played it all...and had everyone up dancing and have a great time. We cant wait to have them play for us again next year! Response from the owner: Thanks so much for having us! it was a blast and we're all looking forward to rocking with you again next year! Monica Cuellar Hired this band for a fall festival and they were fabulous!! It was outdoors and cold, they didn't complain once. They did such an amazing job. Each one of their performers were fabulous. Highly recommend The Grooves to anyone looking for a band. Response from the owner: Thanks for having us! You folks rocked the dance floor and we‚Äôre so much fun! Marcia D Love, love, love this band. They had our entire group on their feet and knew just what an over-55 group likes. Can't wait to hear them again!! Response from the owner: Thanks so much, you folks were a total blast! Donna London The Grooves played at our daughter's wedding at the end of August. We had never met and/or heard the band in person until the day of her wedding. Our daughter and now husband listened to their clip that was on Gigsalad and the venue also recommended them. We were highly impressed with their vocals as well as their song choices plus the songs that we had requested. They were prompt, professional, and reasonable. If you are searching for a band (not a DJ), we would highly recommend that you seek out this group. We had a wonderful time as did our guests and were very pleased with The Grooves! Response from the owner: Thank you so much for the kind words, it was a pleasure performing for you! We wish you all the best and thanks so much for a rocking fun night! Amanda Austin Here's Your Wedding Band!We can't say enough positive words about The Grooves! They are absolutely fantastic! Ron was so easy to work with and very responsive to all our questions (even while he was on vacation!). During the reception, our dance floor was packed! We heard so many great comments from our guests such as "they are the best wedding band" and "they're so awesome!" Book them today!!-Amanda and Ed Austin Response from the owner: Thanks so much! It was awesome performing for you! Such cool folks, and tons of fun! Kay Rust What an amazing night! The Groves were fan-fabulous! If I heard once, I heard multiple times what a great band we booked. Having the ability to accommodate an age group ranging from 25 years old to 85 years young, playing what was requested, adjusting to the crowd, mixing things up, exceeding my expectations in loudness, softness, having quality singers with superb musicians dressing the part were all factors in our Opa Social being a wonderful success. The quality customer service from the moment of that first inquiry call to the final verbal conversation of ‚Äòthank you‚Äô, was not only professional but extremely impressive. Individuals who do not entertain booking The Grooves are missing a reasonably priced wonderful guaranteed fun time experience. Keep being cool.Randy Rust, President Elect of WurstfestKay Rust, Crazy Fan of The Grooves Response from the owner: Thanks so much for the awesome review! Yes, we always try to pick songs that translate across all ages at these private events and it sure keeps everyone happy and on the dance floor! Please keep us in mind for next time, we had a blast too! Kristen Dillard They played for my sister‚Äôs wedding and totally rocked it!! Everyone was on the dance floor the entire night! This band is amazing!!! I would highly recommend them to everyone I know! They are the best! Response from the owner: Thanks so much! It was an honor to be a Part of your sisters special day! You folks were so much fun and everyone in the room was the life of the party! Gina Strieker Look no more for Bands!. The Grooves played at our daughter‚Äôs reception in the Grand Ball Room at the Adolphus on June 29,2019.They were fantastic- I checked out all the bands listed on The Knot and WeddingWire - not one could touch The Grooves- if you want a band that will play Any type of music- interact with your guests- keep your friends and family on the dance floor Please give The Grooves a call! You will not be disappointed. We rate them a 10 in every category! Response from the owner: Thanks so much Gina! it was an honor playing for you! Thanks so much for having us, it was a blast! Read All Reviews How People Find Us When you‚Äôve been gigging all over Texas as long as we have playing for crowds and clients of every type, people find you all kinds of ways! Some through Google reviews , some through wedding planning sites like WeddingWire and The Knot , and a great many through referrals from past clients and audience members. And some folks find us by searching online for specialized professional bands such as: Austin country cover bands Austin motown cover bands Austin wedding cover bands Brenham wedding cover bands Bryan country cover bands Bryan wedding cover bands College Station country bands College Station wedding bands Corpus Christi country bands Corpus Christi wedding bands Dallas country bands Dallas wedding bands Fort Worth country bands Fort Worth wedding bands Fredericksburg wedding bands Galveston country bands Galveston wedding bands Horseshoe Bay country bands Horseshoe Bay wedding bands Houston country bands Houston motown bands Houston wedding bands New Braunfels country bands New Braunfels wedding bands San Antonio country bands San Antonio motown bands San Antonio top 40 bands San Antonio wedding bands The Woodlands country bands The Woodlands wedding bands Victoria wedding bands Waco country bands Waco wedding bands If you‚Äôre looking to have a live band rock your party anywhere else in the great state of Texas, we can help! DESERT GROOVES: WE BUY RECORDS IN AZ! - Sell Your Records Search this site Embedded Files Skip to main content Skip to navigation DESERT GROOVES: WE BUY RECORDS IN AZ! Home Sell Your Records About Us Contact Us DESERT GROOVES: WE BUY RECORDS IN AZ! Home Sell Your Records About Us Contact Us More Home Sell Your Records About Us Contact Us sell your records Contact Us Hassle-Free for Record Selling Services Looking for where to sell vinyl records in Arizona? You can get in touch by filling out the convenient form below, giving us a call, sending a text, or directly emailing us anytime, day or night, 24/7. Call/Text : 602-492-3507 Email: contact@desertgrooves.net Address: 393 W Warner Rd Ste 117 Chandler, AZ 85225 Unlike most shops, we do not require you to bring your record collections to us. We come to you anywhere across the entire greater Phoenix area, Arizona, and accommodate out-of-state buys if needed. In-person visits at our Chandler location are always welcome too! How much do we pay for records? In nearly all situations: Top Dollar. Many claim it, very few deliver it. Please give us the opportunity to prove it. Most shops operate on an outdated model, and make offers based on quantity and low lump sum offers. We have a very transparent system that we'll go over in detail with you. It's simple and based on a specific criteria and on individual records that might stand out. We will go over all of the specifics when we have a phone or email conversation - so please get in touch! What do we buy? Wide range of genres,¬† incl uding but not limited to: Jazz, Soul, Rock & Roll, Blues and international music. We buy LP's and 45's. We will also look at any music related ephemera (posters, flyers, fan merchandise, tees), vintage hi-fi, and some instruments and g uitar pedals . Wh y sell to us? At Desert Grooves, we are dedicated to providing an honest and fair platform for you to sell your records. We love records and want to put your collection in the hands of people who will cherish them for a lifetime. Our focus is on transparency and ensuring that you receive a reasonable offer based on condition, rarity, and market demand of title s within your collection . Our team takes the time to carefully evaluate each record. We respect your time and availability. Let us know what works best for you, and we'll arrange a convenient appointment to meet and discuss your records in person. Top Record Buyer in Greater Phoenix Area - Sell your record collection today! Looking to sell your records in the Greater Phoenix Area? We offer a hassle-free experience with fair offers and immediate payment. Say goodbye to lugging and repeats. Convert your collection into quick cash today! Sell Vinyl Records Near Me Proudly serving Chandler, and the Greater Phoenix & Arizona area. (Chandler, Gilbert, Mesa, Phoenix, Queen Creek, Scottsdale, Cave Creek, Glendale, Peoria, Laveen, Sun Valley, Carefree, Deer Valley, Flagstaff, Payson, Tucson, Apache Junction & beyond) Out of state sales can also be accommodated! Got records gathering dust? Welcome to Desert Grooves, your Chandler, AZ vinyl destination. If you have records to sell, Desert Grooves is actively seeking to buy vinyl records and record collections in Chandler, AZ, and throughout the Valley. We are your reliable option for selling records in the area, offering the best payouts and customer satisfaction. Swing by today to explore our inventory, sell your records, and discover your next favorite record. DESERT GROOVES LLC 393 W WARNER RD STE 117 CHANDLER, AZ 85225 USA 602-492-3507 CONTACT@DESERTGROOVES.NET Google Sites Report abuse Google Sites Report abuse

Terms and conditions Press and media Please contact the press office at Clarion Communications on (0)20 7479 0910 or email wickes@clarioncomms.co.uk . Please note, these contact details are for media enquiries only. Complaints Our Commitment We‚Äôre dedicated to providing a professional and valued service to our customers and partners. We strive to handle customer complaints promptly and fairly. Contacting Us If you're unhappy with something, the fastest way to reach us is through our online chat service. If you'd prefer to talk, call us at 0330 123 4123 : Choose option 1 for a Wickes kitchen, bathroom or home office complaint. Choose option 3 for all other complaints. To escalate your concern, use the contact form below. Select the relevant order type and choose "Something went wrong and I want to raise a complaint." We will acknowledge your complaint within 48 hours and forward it to the appropriate team. Further information might be needed to fully investigate your complaint. Alternatively, you can write to us at our registered address: Complaints Team Wickes Building Supplies Limited Vision House 19 Colonial Way Watford WD24 4JL To help us respond to you as quickly as possible, please include: Your name and address A contact phone number and email Your order number Details of your complaint with supporting photos Actions you‚Äôd like us to consider In the event that the customer services team is unable to resolve your complaint, or if you‚Äôre unhappy with the outcome, you can escalate your complaint by emailing customer.relations@wickes.co.uk , who will acknowledge your complaint within 48 hours and send it to the appropriate team. Resolution We aim to resolve your complaint at the first point of contact. Once the investigation is complete, you will be informed of the outcome. If you remain unhappy with the outcome, you can refer the decision to The Furniture and Home Improvement Ombudsman . They will review your case and may request further information from you or from us. Their decision will be binding upon us. For more information, visit fhio.org . Complaints relating to financial agreements If your complaint relates to the lender, it will be forwarded to them within five days of receipt. We will inform you once it has been sent. If the complaint is partially about the lender's actions, that part will be sent to the lender to investigate, while we will investigate the part related to the sale of the financial product and service. We will conduct a thorough and independent investigation and agree on a suitable outcome with you. Once our investigation is complete, we will inform you of the outcome. If you‚Äôre unhappy with the outcome, you can refer your complaint to the Financial Ombudsman Service . They can be contacted at: Phone: 0800 023 4567 Email: complaint.info@financial-ombudsman.org.uk Mail: Financial Ombudsman Service, Exchange Tower, London E14 9SR Contact form Required Field Reason for contacting us Order & support enquiries How can we help?
